## Playable class

Implements [Libp2p's Startable interface](https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p-interfaces/tree/master/packages/interfaces#startable) for easy reuse with async code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Playable implements Startable 
```
<b>Implements:</b> Startable
